name: re.al
description: The RWA token is the governance token to the re.al ecosystem. RWA will exist unlocked as RWA (ERC-20) and locked as veRWA (ERC-721). When locked into veRWA it will provide holders two primary benefits: Value Accrual: Transaction fee revenue, RWA sales tax and revenue share from the protocols building on the chain will return to veRWA holders. Governance Rights: Help determine the future of re.al through future governance votes $RWA is the first L2 token to comprehensively capture of the value of the chain and return it to holders.
